summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of InvenTrack inventory management system. All backend APIs (20/20) passed with 100% success rate. Frontend authentication, navigation, dashboard, and CRUD operations working correctly. JWT authentication, inventory auto-deduction, and payment status management fully functional.
passed_tests: User registration and login with JWT authentication
Dashboard displays total sales ($2040.98), orders (2), customers (2), low stock alerts (1)
Category management (create, read, delete)
Product management (create, read, update, delete with category association)
Customer management (create, read with contact details)
Invoice creation with multiple items, tax, discount, payment status
Inventory auto-deduction when invoice is created (stock reduced from 45 to 43)
Payment status updates on invoices (pending to paid)
Recent invoices display on dashboard with proper status indicators
All protected routes require JWT token authentication
Dashboard statistics API returning correct data structure
Sales overview chart rendering properly
Navigation between all pages (Dashboard, Products, Customers, Invoices, Categories)
Professional dark theme with vibrant accents implemented
Responsive layout and user interface working
Real-time data updates and synchronization
Form validation and error handling
User session management and logout functionality
Data persistence across page refreshes
Clean API responses with proper HTTP status codes

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (All core functionality working, minor session timeout during extended testing)
